data.text: @NinjaTruite @KivaBay I had a princess who ran away from her abusive dad and was raised by dragons and beverage a wizard and joined the Dragonslayers Guild and would talk to dragons instead of killing them. But she was also a badass fighter too. And had a pet dragon.

@Creepikat @NinjaTruite One of my first oc was from harry potter as well. She was friend with neville londubat and Coline creevey cause they deserve love. She was an alchemist and her past life was Alienor d'Aquitaine.

@NinjaTruite She sounds awesome ! I had so many ocs but the first one I remember was in Naruto, a jinchuriki (people who have demon sealed inside) girl who was used and manipulated by the Akatsuki since a young age but still bonded deeply with some members (yeah I shipped her with Itachi)
@captoring @KivaBay Whoa thanks! I might re-use some of those characteristics in a personal story one day 😊

@NinjaTruite @KivaBay Haha mine was from Harry Potter as well. She was the granddaughter of a potions master and was an expert at defense. She could use anybody's wand. Hers was red cedar and thestral hair (this was after PoA, way before we knew about the Elder Wand). She killed Lucius Malfoy.
@NinjaTruite @KivaBay she sounds amazing wtf you even included flaws and difficulties backed up by a backstory truly precocious
